name: GIant day
description:
(evil verson, 100% complete!)

today is the day, we finished giant day

welcome to giant day, you just crashed landed into earth

your dad gave you a button to turn into a giant.

you pressed the button and you became a giant

do what ever you want, crush humans, destroy buildings and have fun in the simulator. 

it's out RIGHT NOW!


controls

1 kick
2 punch

3 stomp

space  jump smash

arrow keys walk
